referal_program.heading: Referral program
referal_program.desc: We're excited to get you started on securing a monthly residual income. To begin this process, please fill out as much information as you can below. This data is crucial for us to precisely evaluate your potential earnings per referral.  An account manager from our team will review and assess the information provided then follow up with you on next steps. All information provided is kept confidential.  Refer to our Privacy Policies
